metadata.title: MeetMate - Group Scheduling Made Simple
metadata.description: Free group scheduling tool. Create events, share a link, and find the perfect time for everyone. No account required.

homepage.title: Find Time
homepage.subtitle: The modern way to coordinate group schedules. No accounts, no clutter - just share a link and find what works.
homepage.socialProof: Simple scheduling for friends, teams, and communities

fast.description: Create events in under 30 seconds. Share a link. Done. No registration, no downloads, no hassle.

realtime.description: Watch responses arrive in real-time. Everyone stays in sync as availability comes in.

smart.title: Smart Scheduling
smart.description: Automatically calculates the best dates based on everyone's availability. Add password protection if needed.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At MeetMate, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and store your information in compliance with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) and CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act).

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect minimal information necessary to provide our scheduling service:

items.eventData: Event names and date ranges you create
items.participantNames: Participant names entered when joining events
items.sessionTokens: Unique session tokens (UUIDs) stored in your browser's localStorage for session management
items.ipAddresses: IP addresses for security and abuse prevention (automatically logged by our hosting provider)
items.technicalData: Browser type, device type, and access times for service improvement

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.description: Your data is used exclusively for:

items.realtime: Enabling real-time updates when participants submit availability
items.optimal: Calculating optimal meeting dates based on participant availability
items.security: Preventing abuse and ensuring service security
items.improvement: Improving service performance and user experience

howWeUse.noSelling: We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.

items.encryption: All data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest
items.database: Stored in Supabase (PostgreSQL) with industry-standard security practices
items.location: Data is stored in secure data centers with physical and digital security measures
items.access: Access to data is restricted to essential personnel only
items.passwords: Event passwords are hashed using bcrypt (never stored in plain text)

dataRetention.title: 4. Data Retention Policy
dataRetention.description: We automatically delete event data after 30 days of inactivity to minimize data storage:

items.automatic: Events and all associated data (participants, availability) are deleted 30 days after the event's end date
items.manual: Event creators can manually delete events at any time through the admin controls
items.immediate: Deletion is immediate and permanent - data cannot be recovered

localStorage.title: 5. Browser Storage (localStorage)
localStorage.description: We use your browser's localStorage to store session tokens:

items.purpose: Session tokens allow you to edit your availability when returning to an event
items.control: You can clear this data anytime through your browser settings
items.noTracking: We do not use cookies for tracking or advertising

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR & CCPA)
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your data:

items.access: Right to access: Request a copy of your personal data
items.rectification: Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate data
items.erasure: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data (event creators can delete events directly)
items.portability: Right to data portability: Receive your data in a structured format
items.object: Right to object: Object to data processing
items.restrict: Right to restriction: Request restricted processing of your data
items.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent at any time

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use the following third-party services:

supabase.name: Supabase (Database & Real-time)
supabase.purpose: Secure data storage and real-time synchronization

thirdParty.note: These services may have access to technical data (IP addresses, request logs) as part of their infrastructure.

noAccounts.title: 8. No User Accounts
noAccounts.description: MeetMate does not require user accounts or authentication. You do not need to provide email addresses, phone numbers, or create passwords to use our service. All participation is anonymous except for the names you choose to provide when joining events.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of MeetMate after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using MeetMate, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using MeetMate, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.description: MeetMate is a free, web-based group scheduling tool that allows users to:

items.create: Create scheduling events without requiring user accounts

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: When using MeetMate, you agree to:

items.accurate: Provide accurate information when creating events or participating
items.lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes
items.respectful: Not abuse, harass, or harm other users
items.noSpam: Not use the service for spam, phishing, or malicious activities
items.security: Keep event passwords secure and confidential
items.noAutomation: Not use automated tools to abuse the service (bots, scrapers)

items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the service
items.impersonate: Impersonate others or provide false information

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: MeetMate and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by the service provider and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.description: MeetMate is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that:

items.uninterrupted: The service will be uninterrupted or error-free
items.secure: The service will be completely secure
items.accurate: All information will be accurate or reliable

dataLoss.title: 7. Data Loss
dataLoss.description: We are not responsible for data loss resulting from:

items.localStorage: Loss of session tokens from browser data clearing

dataLoss.backup: We recommend keeping your own records of important event details.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
